original_title: Network marketing company, Sonrich Ashia recognised at BWIO awards
original_body_lines: Sonrich Ashia (Pvt) Ltd, a leading network marketing company in Sri Lanka, was recently honored as the best network marketing company of the year at the BWIO award ceremony, hosted by the Business World International Organization. The event, which took place at the Taj Samudra Hotel in Colombo, saw the Chairman of Sonrich Ashia Krishantha Udumullage and Managing Director/CEO Kalpa Udantha accept the award on behalf of the company.

Specializing in ayurvedic and cosmetic products, Sonrich Ashia follows a unique network marketing model, where consumers can purchase goods directly from the company without intermediaries. Established in 2013, the company has been able to make significant progress in the Sri Lankan market by introducing products that aid weight loss, reduce the risk of diabetes and cholesterol and rejuvenate the skin to make it look younger.
